summary: This bill, the "Communities Helping Invest through Property and Improvements Needed for Veterans Act of 2025" (CHIP IN for Veterans Act of 2025), aims to amend title 38 of the United States Code concerning veterans' affairs. It makes permanent a pilot program allowing the Department of Veterans Affairs to accept donated facilities and related improvements. The bill expands the scope of the program to include minor construction and maintenance projects and extends the program's authorization period to December 16, 2031. It also makes conforming amendments throughout the relevant sections to reflect these changes.
